Package stars

Class Student

java.lang.Object
stars.User
stars.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Student
extends User
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a Student in the system

      public Student()

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, int year, int numberOFAUs, java.util.ArrayList<RegisteredCourse> regCourses, java.lang.String school, java.lang.String choice, java.lang.String recipient, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String typeOfUser, java.lang.String userName)
      Parameters:
      name - name of new student
      matricNumber - matriculation number of new student
      gender - gender of new student
      nationality - nationality of new student
      year - year of study of new student
      numberOFAUs - Number of AUs already registered by Student
      regCourses - list of registered Courses by Student
      school - school name this new student belongs to
      choice - notification choice of new student
      recipient - recipient address of new student
      email - email of new student
      password - actual password of new student
      typeOfUser - user type of new student
      userName - username of new student

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, int year, java.lang.String school, java.lang.String choice, java.lang.String recipient, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String typeOfUser, java.lang.String userName)
      Create student object
      Parameters:
      name - name of new student
      matricNumber - matriculation number of new student
      gender - gender of new student
      nationality - nationality of new student
      year - year of study of new student
      school - school name this new student belongs to
      choice - notification choice of new student
      recipient - recipient address of new student
      email - email of new student
      password - actual password of new student
      typeOfUser - user type of new student
      userName - username of new student
